name: Innovia AI
description: Innovia AI is focused on delivering AI tools that not only solve today’s challenges but lay the groundwork for more! Our mission starts with Butler Bot, a Telegram tool that combines real-time automation, moderation, and intelligence to streamline how telegram communities operate. As communities are what drive the success of projects, we’re focused on delivering tools that not only solve today’s challenges but lay the groundwork for a smarter, safer, and more efficient telegram user base.
